verses.verse: Let <S%G3306><s%> brotherly love <S%G5360><s%> continue. <S%G3306><s%>

<S%G1950><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> forget <S%G1950><s%> to show hospitality to strangers, <S%G5381><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> in doing <S%G3778><s%> so, <S%G1223><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> have entertained <S%G3579><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> without knowing it. <S%G2990><s%>

Remember <S%G3403><s%> those who are in bonds, <S%G1198><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> bound with them; <S%G4887><s%> and those who are ill-treated, <S%G2558><s%> since <S%G5613><s%> you <S%G846><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body. <S%G4983><s%>

Let marriage <S%G1062><s%> be held in <S%G1722><s%> honor <S%G5093><s%> among all, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let the bed <S%G2845><s%> be undefiled: <S%G283><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will judge <S%G2919><s%> the sexually immoral <S%G4205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulterers. <S%G3432><s%>

Be <S%G5158><s%> free from the love <S%G866><s%> of money, <S%G714><s%> content with such things as you have, <S%G3918><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> has said, <S%G2046><s%> "I will <S%G447><s%> in no <S%G3756><s%> way <S%G3361><s%> leave <S%G447><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> neither will I in any <S%G3756><s%> way <S%G3361><s%> forsake <S%G1459><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%>"

So that <S%G5620><s%> with <S%G3004><s%> good courage <S%G2292><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is my <S%G1698><s%> helper. <S%G998><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fear. <S%G5399><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> can man <S%G444><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> to me? <S%G3427><s%>"

Remember <S%G3421><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> leaders, <S%G2233><s%> men who <S%G3748><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to you <S%G5216><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and considering <S%G333><s%> the results <S%G1545><s%> of their <S%G3739><s%> conduct, <S%G391><s%> imitate <S%G3401><s%> their faith. <S%G4102><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the same <S%G846><s%> yesterday, <S%G5504><s%> <S%G2532><s%> today, <S%G4594><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G4064><s%> carried away <S%G4064><s%> by various <S%G4164><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strange <S%G3581><s%> teachings, <S%G1322><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%> that <S%G950><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> be established <S%G950><s%> by grace, <S%G5485><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> by food, <S%G1033><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> those who were so occupied <S%G4043><s%> were <S%G5623><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> benefited. <S%G4043><s%>

We have <S%G2192><s%> an altar <S%G2379><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> those who serve <S%G3000><s%> the holy tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> right <S%G1849><s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the bodies <S%G4983><s%> of <S%G2226><s%> those <S%G5130><s%> animals, <S%G2226><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> is brought <S%G1533><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy place <S%G39><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%> as an offering for <S%G4012><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> are burned <S%G2618><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> of the camp. <S%G3925><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might sanctify <S%G37><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> of the gate. <S%G4439><s%>
Let us therefore <S%G5106><s%> go out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> of the camp, <S%G3925><s%> bearing <S%G5342><s%> his <S%G846><s%> reproach. <S%G3680><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> don't <S%G5602><s%> have here an enduring <S%G3306><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> but <S%G235><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> seek <S%G1934><s%> that which is to come. <S%G3195><s%>

Through <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> let us offer <S%G399><s%> up a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> of praise <S%G133><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> continually, <S%G1275><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of <S%G5491><s%> lips <S%G5491><s%> which proclaim allegiance <S%G3670><s%> to <S%G3686><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> forget <S%G1950><s%> to be doing good <S%G2140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sharing, <S%G2842><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> with such <S%G5108><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is well pleased. <S%G2100><s%>

Obey <S%G3982><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> leaders and <S%G2532><s%> submit <S%G5226><s%> to them, <S%G1063><s%> for they <S%G846><s%> watch <S%G69><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> souls, <S%G5590><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> those who will give <S%G591><s%> account, <S%G3056><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with groaning, <S%G4727><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> would be unprofitable <S%G255><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

Pray <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> we are persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> desiring <S%G2309><s%> to live <S%G390><s%> honorably <S%G2573><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> I strongly <S%G4056><s%> urge <S%G3870><s%> you to do <S%G4160><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may be restored <S%G600><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> sooner. <S%G5032><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> may the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace, <S%G1515><s%> who brought again <S%G321><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep <S%G4263><s%> with the <S%G1242><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of an eternal <S%G166><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

make <S%G2675><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> complete <S%G2675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> working <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that which is well pleasing <S%G2101><s%> in <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sight, <S%G1799><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> endure <S%G430><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of exhortation, <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I have written <S%G1989><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> few words. <S%G1024><s%>

Know <S%G1097><s%> that our brother <S%G80><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> has been freed, <S%G630><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> whom, <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> shortly, <S%G5032><s%> I will see <S%G3700><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
